entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind light except gusting to 50 km/h at times. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
